h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: When the path turns into a large valley, another Falcon Guai will appear, only this one is empowered by the Spirit within. You'll need to attack cautiously against this stronger foe, using Spirit attacks to stagger him, and Cloud Step to sidestep his gusts to flank him from the sides. Defeat him, and you'll gain the Falcon Hermit Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
When the path turns into a large valley, another Falcon Guai will appear, only this one is empowered by the Spirit within. You'll need to attack cautiously against this stronger foe, using Spirit attacks to stagger him, and Cloud Step to sidestep his gusts to flank him from the sides. Defeat him, and you'll gain the Falcon Hermit Spirit.
